description: React component for managing a directory of camp members, allowing admin users to create and delete members, with search functionality.

methods.name: People()
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of members, supports searching, adding, and deleting members for authorized users.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches members based on current search query and updates the component state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles form submission to create a new member, triggers a reload of the members list.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a member after user confirmation and reloads the members list.
